e="preserve">Charles Wood (6 August 1932 – 1 February 2020) was a British playwright and scriptwriter. He was born in Guernsey. Wood was known for his works in "The Knack...and How to Get It", "Help!" and "Iris". He was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of Literature in 1984. He was nominated for many BAFTA Awards during his career.
Wood died on 1 February 2020 at the age of 87.
